review_text: The Carriage House was a great place to stay. It was close to family. The area was quiet at night. We loved the kitchen & sitting area. We will be returning in the future.
Great place, helpful host. Great stay!

We had such a wonderful stay here. The pictures don’t do it justice. Such a relaxing and pleasant atmosphere in the house and garden. There is even a swing chair in the kitchen! I especially loved the master bedroom. Super comfy bed and linens, and the room was just so relaxing.
We felt treated with all the cereals, snacks and cooking supplies provided.
Hosts were quick to respond and kind. I could really go on about everything. The block it’s on is lovely and walkable. A few blocks away is a little rough looking but we only found that out by walking around the town. If we ever come by this was again, I would stay here.
I couldn’t be happier. Absolutely beautiful and comfortable!
Kugler Cottage was a wonderful place to stay while we adventured out to see the eclipse. We enjoyed learning the history of the house and of Oil City.
Beautiful old home in a historic town, would stay there again if I’m ever in the area.

This place is beautiful! Staying in an old Victorian house is a great experience, and Oil City is full of some massive homes as a result of the area’s wealth generated by the early oil and gas industry. A great escape for the weekend or a week - very close to the Allegheny River Trails as well.

Historic, well maintained home. Like staying in a museum. Can’t wait to research more of the history.
Host was responsive and helpful. The house is beautifully cared-for. It is historic- and furnished as such. Because it is historic - know that outlets are not always “convenient”.
Worked out fine for my visit.
If you want to relax this is the best place to go.
Excellent accomodations for what we were looking for. No problems at all. Definitely recommended!
Spacious place to stay for group of people.

Stayed for ball tournament. Unfortunately it got canceled due to weather. House was nice to hang out and just spend quality time together. Would like to stay again if we are in the tournament next year.
Great stay!
Always a pleasure, hope to return soon!
Rhanks you Ryan for haveing such a wonderfully set up place to stay in. We felt very comfortable and acommodated. The place suited our needs very well and definately a return customer.
Was a pleasure to deal with Ryan. Would definitely stay again.

Ryan's place was great! Check in was simple and the house was very clean. I loved the coffee/tea bar, which was well stocked. Plenty of room for everyone to spread out and have their own space. Ryan was so responsive and friendly, he was wonderful host!

Beautiful home! Lots of space to spread out and relaxed. Host provided games which was awesome for down-time. We visited with Girl Scouts to hike and watch the eclipse. We would definitely stay here again if/when we come back in the area!
Always excellent staying with Ryan, great host!
A spacious accommodation in beautiful western Pennsylvania. Our host Ryan was very prompt in responding to any of our questions.

This place is well worth a stay! We loved how much this house felt like a home from the moment we stepped in. Every room is spacious, clean, and well organized. We are definitely going to be booking again some time soon!
This was the second time we rented this property and it was fabulous as usual. It was convenient to our family and spacious as well as clean.
Ryan was a great host and the house met our needs perfectly. Very spacious and can accomodate a large group.
Spacious house in a wonderful neighborhood. Nice office space for finishing work when I got back. Kitchen was well-stocked with utensils and appliances. I would definitely stay here again!
Place was extremely clean and super inviting. Ryan was very clear with the instructions and made everything easy for our stay. Highly recommend this place for anyone coming to the area.

Great house, easy to find. The house looks just as it does in the pictures, and everything was just what my family needed for the duration of our stay. The house was very clean and organized, with clear instructions for any questions we had. It felt more like a home than any hotel could and if we are ever back in the area we would definitely hope that this place is available!
This is the second time I have stayed here and will definitely stay here again.

We had a great stay in this house. Very spacious and convenient. It was well stocked with things. It was a family get together for me and my sisters and husbands and had greater room for us to cook, eat and be able to have private space.
Nice and clean. Plenty of room

The home was a perfect fit for our family group. Excellent to meet the needs of a large group. Very spacious rooms. Kitchen stocked with essentials which made cooking meals easy so we did not have to eat out. Very nice coffee bar. Large dining table was a great space for meals and games. Living area with clean, comfortable seating. Large bedrooms and everyone commented on comfortable beds. 2 large bathrooms with plenty of towels. I was worried about the location being close to a main road but this was not an issue at all, very little traffic noise. Large back yard with an apple tree, which was a favorite spot for deer. House conveniently located to Oil City and Cranberry. Communication from host very clear. Highly recommend this home to anyone visiting the area. I hope to stay here again next year.

Excellent stay as always!
Thanks Ryan!
Lovely home with great amenities. Saw deer in the mornings in the backyard. Lots of room for our group to spread out and feel comfortable in the home. Felt like home.

The house was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed the spacious rooms and had plenty of areas to rest, do laundry and watch TV. The house is much bigger than it looks in the pictures. We hope to go there again!
Beautiful place and spacious! We love the place! Want to come back next year!
Ryan’s home had everything you would need while there. All the bedrooms had mirror, safety blinds throughout, safety features in first floor bathroom. Large yard and great parking
Very large, spacious, and beautiful house. Clean and comfortable. Very pretty area with a river and green hills. Had delicious food delivered from a local eatery.

This roomy home is lovely, neat, clean and looks exactly as presented in the photos! It’s on a quiet street, so sleeping with the windows open would not be a problem. The nice host, Ryan, went above and beyond to make us feel at home and was very accommodating, kind and responsive to my questions. Everyone in my group said they enjoyed their stay. We would definitely stay here again if/when in the area. I highly recommend this location in Oil City!

We had such a great stay. The house is even bigger than I expected, and was truly perfect for our family gathering! Absolutely everything we needed was there and easy to find. Extra chairs and high chair in the cabinet. Every pot, pan, and utensil needed to cook a big meal. We were 2 adults and 4 kids ranging in age from 2-15 and we could all spread out and find something to do, whether relaxing in the very comfortable living room, coloring in the office, or throwing a football in the *huge* backyard. There were 6 of us, but if you were a larger group you could also be very comfortable! The setup is excellent and very spacious for meals, sleeping, etc.
Ryan was a great host- easy to find the place, easy to get in, very communicative. Thanks so much for a great stay!
Ryan is a great host. We traveled with older ladiesand could easily navigate the property. Lots of night lights helped when waking in an unfamiliarplace. I highly recommend it!

This place is wonderful!
Large rooms with very comfortable furniture & bedding.
The kitchen has everything you could want.
It is immaculate with very nice decor.
Owner was very easy to work with.
Would definitely stay again!
Roomy, comfortable, clean home with everything you might need.
Great place to stay. I’ve already booked the house for my next trip.
My family absolutely loved this house. we felt very comfortable and everything was clean. We appreciate the opportunity to stay!

this is the third time we have stayed at a property hosted by Ryan, and it was exactly as we expected. Ryan's places are clean and comfortable. Ryan is quick to respond if you ever need anything. I'm sure we'll be back in the future.

This was a great stay, twice in a week. All my concerns in first stay were addressed by Ryan in the following stay. My family enjoyed the time in the house. Big, spacious with lot of greenery around. I do recommend this.
Best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Great hosts with a fantastic house. Definitely stay again if in the area.
We had a wonderful stay!
Place was big, clean and as expected from photos. Kitchen was stocked with coffee and basic items. We had a pleasant stay. Overall good and convenient for night stay in the journey.
Very nice and spacious house with all the amenities. Nice bathrooms and showers and comfortable beds. Very friendly and responsive hosts, easy instructions etc…

What you see is what you get. Super clean and super clear instructions for the home. Great locations—the windows open in the bedroom for nice fresh air while you sleep. Wonderful place! Hope to use Ryan’s home again in the future. Thank you!!

Excellent stay again! Ryan went out of his way to get us a BBQ!
We will be back for sure

Ryan's place near Oil City was great! Had more than enough beds and space for 6 of us. Very close and easy to navigate to town. Checking in and out was an absolute breeze. Will definitely be staying here again!
Very comfortable, very clean & very lovely! Highly recommend!

We have rented three of Ryan's listings for our crew this month and every booking was super smooth. Ryan is very responsive and helpful. Couldn't ask for a more accommodating host. This home served us well and the guys appreciated some space to lounge and not be stuck in hotel rooms. I highly recommend this host and his listings.

Cozy, comfortable, rural setting. We enjoyed a nice, quiet evening with my family after my sisters performance. The kitchen was nicely stocked with cooking needs, oatmeal, coffee, and tea. Can definitely accommodate large families. Very clean home.

First off Ryan was very welcoming and stayed in communication with us throughout our stay. It was a very comfortable place to stay. Power went out one of our mornings but house had a generator that automatically kicked in and powered the whole house. That was awesome. Everything that you would need was provided. All kinds of shopping within minutes away if you needed anything more than what was provided. We will definitely be coming back. Thank you Ryan fir being a great host.
Ryan was great. Very helpful and a pleasure to communicate with. We had a great trip and would definitely stay again!

Comfortable, clean, beautiful, quiet and easy to find. A very nice area and a big house.
We enjoyed the stay. Thank you Ryan.
the was a start my crew local. they having private bedrooms a whole house to share instead of being cooped up in a hotel for the week. The house was well appointed, clean and roomy. Great find!

Excellent place to stay, quick response, it was everything we needed!
Super clean and tidy.

This house was clean and cozy! It had everything you need in a home away from home. The amenities matched the description perfectly. The location was peaceful and quiet and it was close enough to everything I needed it to be. And the host, Ryan, was fantastic!
I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again in the future.

This location was perfect for our stay. a short distance to the work site and plenty of restaurants for those nights that cooking was not an option. Ryan was a great host and was able to respond to all of our requests
Such a great house! This is the probably the cleanest Airbnb I've stayed at. Really nice large updated house with all the amenities and then some. Will definitely be back. Thanks :)
The house was spacious and the kitchen was fully equipped. Ryan was very communicative and a great host.
Wonderful stay

This was the perfect Airbnb for our family! The house was exactly as described with plenty of room for everyone in our group, which turned out to be larger than we originally expected and was close to everything we needed. We'll definitely be booking again!

Excellent home for a large group. Great amenities. Kitchen was well equipped. Coffee bar was awesome. House is roomy and comfortable. Easy drive into town.
We were there for a family event in Oil City, it was perfect. Thank you!

The house was a great place to stay just a little outside Oil City. My wife and I had our small kids there, as well as several other relatives. It wasn't clear in the description, but there's a nice breezeway as you enter the house, which made a nice staging area for coats, bags, etc.
The house was nicely decorated, but without much that we needed to worry about the kids breaking. One of the bedrooms with a large bed had a convenient closet where we set up the provided pack & play and left the door cracked for a little one to sleep.
Ryan was communicative and obliging as well. Overall, it was one of the best places for us to stay as a family while spending time with other relatives in the region (both at their houses and at Ryan's place).

Great house. Spacious, had family In for a visit, lots of comfortable room. House was very clean, lots of extra little touches like coffee and tea bags and oatmeal. Very attentive host. Would definitely stay there again.

My family and I spent the weekend here and we had an incredible time. So many good things to say: The house was plenty big enough for 11 of us, the large backyard was perfect for the kids, the neighborhood was safe, the beds were quite comfortable, incredible amenities (coffee bar, snacks, fully stocked kitchen/bathrooms, linens, laundry baskets, garbage bags, first aid kit, and much more), and Ryan was an excellent host (great communication, accommodating, friendly). We look forward to staying here again in the future.
Very clean and nicely kept house. We had a great time , everything was perfect.
This home in Franklin was perfect! Great location on the river but easy access to trails, restaurants, and shops.
Nice place and great communication from the host made our stay in Franklin perfect !!!

This rental was perfect for our family. We came and went at different times and access was flexible and easy. The place is spacious and clean. The neighborhood is quiet and it was nice to enjoy our morning sitting by the river. The location is ideal for kayaking, walking into town or biking. We will definitely stay again.
We had a great time

We had a great time staying at Nellie and Thomas’ house - it was the perfect place for my wife, mother and our dog to have a home away from home where we could also socialize with my wife parents, as we were in town for Easter. The apartment had everything we needed and my mother enjoyed the peaceful view of the river from her bedroom and the kitchen. We will definitely stay again when visiting Franklin!

Great stay for the few weeks we were here. Host was very communicative. The river view is great! House was stocked with anything a dog could want; treats, food dish, dog bed, toy, etc which was a cute add-on. Host was also very quick to fix the bathroom fan when it started going out.

Not only was this place beautiful, but the hosts are wonderful people. I needed a long term place to stay while working a contract, and Nellie and Thomas’s place felt like an actual home to come “home” to after work week after week.
They put a lot of love into making their place comfortable for anyone who stays.
Also, communication was amazing, checking in with me if I needed anything, answered any question I had almost immediately.
Nellie and Thomas set the bar pretty high for how to run a beautiful Airbnb.
Thank you for everything.
Absolutely will stay here again if I’m ever back in the area.

Nellie and Thomas are wonderful hosts and their place is absolutely stunning! Exactly as described, cute, clean, organized, had everything I needed. And they were extremely communicative and helpful!
Looking forward to my extended stay in this beautiful home while I’m in the area for work.
Thank you for everything so far!
The second time we have stayed here, the home has a beautiful river view, close to downtown Franklin. The home is well equipped and is very clean.

We had a great stay! We mostly cooked and just enjoyed our time together. The kitchen was a dream for this as it was extremely well stocked. We didn’t use the backyard but the view is gorgeous. Very clean and accommodating!
Felt right at home great place to get away.
Top notch hosts! Accommodating and friendly. Best we have stayed with. We were here for work but would not hesitate to come back. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
This house was a quiet respite for me when I needed it most! So comfortable and the location on the river is incredible! Everything you need is here. I will definitely be back!
We had a wonderful stay, highly recommend
Just beautiful!
Very enjoyable. Well stocked and pleasant

The house was very clean and well decorated. The neighbors were very nice. We felt like it was a safe neighborhood. The host was very responsive and accommodated our therapy dog for our Son. We enjoyed the river view and hope to come back. Highly recommend this Airbnb.
Thank you Nellie and Thomas for the great accommodations and being pet friendly. We loved watching the river from the house and back yard.
Very clean and comfortable place right next to the river and in a nice small town. Would highly recommend.

OUTSTANDING HOST THEY KEEP ME WE INFORMED ABOUT THE HOUSE. EVERY THING IN KITCHEN CABINETS WAS WELL ORGANIZED AND LABELED. DID NOT HAVE TO LOOK FOR ANY THING. THE HOUSE WAS SPOT LESS VERY IMPRESSED . I WILL BE BACK I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM THANKS AGAIN FOR A VERY ENJOYABLE AND WONDERFUL STAY. FELT LIKE HOME

Nellie and Thomas’s house on the Allegheny river has beautiful nature views spanning the whole backside of the first floor. It’s located right beside a boat launch that offered lots of grassy spots to walk our poodles. Every little added amenities from a charging station on the nightstand to onsite washer and dryer. A mirror in all 3 bedrooms, large closets with hangers, a shoe holder, and a luggage stand. Everything to make you comfortable while you are away from home.

We had a wonderful stay. House is big and perfectly decorated. River view is great. House is the last in the block Neighboring a boat launch which extends the view.
There is some traffic sound from the highway across the river but mostly quiet. Good to know that there is a lower apartment which could be rented. We look forward to coming again. Thanks Nellie and Thomas.
It was quiet and beautiful. On the water. Easy to get to. Nellie and Thomas were efficient hosts.
Beautiful home. It is conveniently located and an amazing view.
Nellie & Thomas ~ Your place was perfect to meet our lodging needs…a beautiful setting, very clean, and so nicely decorated. We would definitely book it again. Thank you so much!
Nice place on the water, cozy, clean place. Would definitely book again if ever in the area.
This location was exactly what I needed for my time in the area. The house was beautiful and perfectly clean, and we had access to everything we needed to feel right at home.

My dog Lincoln and I had a peaceful stay at Nellie and Thomas’s home. We really enjoyed the wrap around porch deck, and watching the mallard ducks fly down to the river. The first evening we arrived in was sunny and warm, and the last day we were there, it was snowing! We got to witness Springtime at its finest! Thank you so much for this memorable getaway. We were escaping from East Palestine, Ohio and the Norfolk Southern train derailment clean up-which is very close to our home.
We hope we can stay here again in the future, under much better circumstances!
Thank you again for everything.
Lonnie and her best friend, Lincoln ❤️

Immediately fell in love with the view of the river! From the kitchen to the dining room to two of the three upstairs bedrooms, the view is amazing! My wife and I talked about taking another trip over warmer months and working remote so we could enjoy the river during downtime.
Convenient to everywhere. Very clean and cozy. Left wanting to buy the place. 😂❤️
We’ll definitely be repeat guests.
Only downside (and this is probably my fault for not researching a little better) is that I thought we truly had the whole home to ourselves (per the description).
Discovered the home was split into two separate rental units upon arrival. We rented the larger upper unit (3 bed, 1 bath), but there’s another unit on the ground/basement level of the house.
We have a daughter who has some pretty intense ‘stranger danger’ at times and she was uncomfortable the last night when a new group checked into the lower unit. She (we) were so worn out from hiking all day that we crashed pretty quickly.

This upper unit is basically a 3 bedroom house. Bed was comfy, bathroom is good size with tub/shower, cozy tv room on the first floor, large kitchen with everything you could want. It is right on the river, I enjoyed watching the water and hearing the birds. Peaceful neighborhood. Hosts are very helpful and accommodating. Everything very clean. The stairway to the second floor might be a little steep for older people, but stairs are carpeted. The house is right next to the boat launch, and place where you can rent kayaks. Great location!
Very peaceful and relaxing stay with great views
Great ! Truly appreciate the great stay
Beautiful clean home decorated beautifully. we had just a quick one night, but we would love to stay again longer, and use the river.
Beautiful spot on the Allegheny River. We woke to snow in the morning and it was gorgeous. Everything was very clean and comfortable.
Wonderful place. Highly recommend
Truly some the best host I ever had ! the view from the kitchen is so amazing to have coffee every morning . close to everything
Great stay felt right at home.
Great spot to enjoy quality time with family.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The house was very clean and cozy and the location is picturesque and very peaceful. Nellie and Thomas really went above and beyond to create a fantastic experience for our stay.

Nellie and Tom were helpful, responsive immediately, and very thoughtful. Household furnishings were functional but also lovely, edited, peaceful, pleasurable. They even decorated for Christmas, that's the spirit!
Great Internet connections and access to Prime.
Riverfront is beautiful in any season, we so enjoyed walking along river front. We loved the private parking and walking area immediately beyond the house. Summer time would afford great campfire activity.
Kitchen dining bistro table easily seated five for meals and games, with another three seats available at end of the kitchen bar. We cooked meals in the well stocked kitchen that included every cookware piece you will need.
Excellent time at this Airbnb. Well done!

This was the nicest AIRBNB we have ever stayed in around the Franklin/Oil City area. The home was very clean and well equipped with a beautiful view of the Allegheny River. Very nice touches like a selection of coffee, teas, spices and even some organic oatmeal. We were very relaxed in this convenient Franklin location.
The house was very nice as shown in the pictures.The town has a nice variety of restaurants.I would recommend this place to everyone that is looking to stay in the area for a great stay .
Everything was exceptional. It was very clean, nicely decorated and located in an awesome area. Will definitely go back!
What a beautiful house in the perfect location. These hosts thought of everything. Nellie and Thomas are very easy to communicate with and accommodating to their guests!

This home provided an incredible retreat for us. The home and view are beautiful. So many extra touches in the home and additional amenities provided a wonderful experience. Conveniently located to adventure and activities. House immaculate, furnishings beautiful and very comfortable. Communication with hosts very prompt. Large kitchen table was great for playing cards and games on a rainy day. Kitchen well stocked. Chairs and campfire site along the creek provided such a relaxing time. Porch rocking chairs were so nice for morning coffee. If you are in the area, I would not recommend any other place but this. Absolutely the best AirBNB we have every stayed at.

My husband and I loved staying in Nellie and Thomas' place! The view from the kitchen and dining area is of the river. This is the main reason we chose this place. The main floor is spacious; all the cabinets and drawers in the large open kitchen are labeled so it's easy to find what you're looking for. The beds are extremely comfortable and the house was immaculate when we arrived. Nellie and Thomas responded very quickly when we contacted them about a couple of things we needed and immediately took care of us.

We went away for a weekend to go hiking. Everything was clean and had cozy vibes. The view of the river was pretty to look out at in the mornings. No issues with anything, and Nellie and Thomas replied within the hour if we had questions about the place.

Great place to stay with a lot of things close by. Clean house with everything you need for a getaway. Beds are comfortable and atmosphere was pleasing. Nellie and Thomas were responsive and helpful when needed. We would definitely stay again if in the area!

We stayed and Nellie and Thomas's Allegheny River Retreat from 5 to 9 September and very much enjoyed our stay. The house is spacious and nicely furnished with 3 bedrooms and a bath upstairs, and living, dining and kitchen on ground level, washer/dryer in the basement. Attention to detail in quality of furnishings, coffee and tea provided, dishes and silverware, and appliances were at a level above what we've experienced thus far in our Airbnb experiences. During our stay, Nellie and Thomas were quick to answer questions about various things like trash pick-up and checkout checklists, when I messaged them. Before arriving, we were worried about parking on the street, but after arrival we found that parking was not an issue as the house is situated on a quiet end of the street. We came to ride our bikes on the many trails in the area - - it was well worth the trip. This area has one of the best networks of bicyling trails in the country. We look forward to making this same trip in the autumn of next year and hope Allegheny River Retreat will be available for our stay.

This home is absolutely beautiful! It is right next to the Franklin Boat Launch so it’s super easy to access the Allegheny River. It is also close to a cute town with lots of good restaurant options. Nellie and Thomas are super responsive and accommodating. The house has everything you would need and the location is amazing, views of the Allegheny River and Mountains. If you plan to kayak use the recommendation to plan OARS to pick you up down stream, the current can be tough to paddle back upstream to the house. I absolutely recommend this place to anyone who wants to relax in nature and still have WIFI and a SMART TV!

We spent a very nice time at Nellie and Thomas’s home. Besides the beautiful view of the river from the kitchen and dining area, we were very impressed by the coziness and cleanliness of the place. The kitchen was complete with everything you may need, from the basics to a cabinet full of spices, teas, coffee and more. Little things that make you feel at home. The beds and couch are super comfy, perfect for a relaxing weekend. Nellie and Thomas responsiveness to our needs was great, full of suggestions of places to visit and restaurants to try. Great hosts!
N&T, the peach pie was delicious!!!! Thanks!!
Beautiful home. The view of the river and the mountains was incredible. Great hosts. The house was very clean and very comfortable. Definitely would like to return for another stay.
Had a very nice stay along the Beautiful Allegheny River in the quaint little town of Franklin. Nice and peaceful getaway from Pittsburgh. The listing as advertised!

Your place was absolutely beautiful. The kids loved the large couch and the fact that the TV is a smart TV with Netflix, Disney, and other channels they always watch. The windows in the kitchen are amazing looking out to the river. The beds and the sheeting are excellent! The place is stocked with everything you need for a great stay. We're looking forward to visiting Oil City more knowing that we have a great place to stay in the future. Thanks again for a great stay.

What a great place to stay, not only can you walk to everything, Nellie and Thomas have thought of everything for you! Great location, very clean, amazing porch and back yard as well.
Bring your bikes, tubes, kayaks, and appetites, this house, the river and historic town will surely never cease to amaze. Best small town vacation ever!
Nellie and Thomas get two thumbs up for their beautiful property. House was beautiful. Scenery was as well. Perfect getaway for family or couples.
Beautiful little apartment loft. Perfect for my needs, loved the view outside of the space!
exactly as described. Tranquil.

Great stay and wonderful host! Fully functioning kitchen, which was great to cook some food. Beautiful azaleas and scenery around the house! The best part was sitting on the porch with coffee and enjoying the views.
If you want an isolated rural retreat, this is the place for you.
Great place to stay. Very clean. Quiet location. Perfect for solo traveler or a couple

This place is very quiet and secluded. An excellent place to stay and relax. Very clean and comfortable.
I definitely will return for future stays.

Very nice place to stay.
Was peace; and after a long day at work and a 2 1/2hr drive, checking in couldn't have more easy.
This was a quiet little spot, perfect for just a quick night before I had to move on. Everything was neat and clean and the instructions were clear and simple. Thanks so much!

I was working locally with a late finish day ine and an extremely early start on day two. I needed a quiet place to relax and get some rest. Ryan was responsive and polite. The space was exactly as described. It was just what I needed and perfect in every way. Thank you!!

Beautiful homey apartment. We decided to cook one night and the had everything we needed. Really nice and peaceful stay to relax, unwind and disconnect. There was a lovely winery 20 minutes away and lots of hiking/ biking options close by.
The space was very clean and cozy and nestled in a beautiful quiet spot. Ryan was a great and responsive host and communicator. This was a cute place to stay while we visited family.
Will stay here again! Quiet and perfect!
My husband had nothing but great things to say! 10/10 would recommend for a peaceful getaway.

Ryan's Place was great! Exactly how it was described and matched the pictures. Ryan was very quick to respond to messages and was very helpful. Gave great directions and instructions to the suite. I would definitely stay here again if I am ever in the area!

We had a great stay and Ryan was very quick to respond to questions. Perfect place to stay if you are looking for a quiet, private place for a weekend and don't need wifi/a TV. Kitchen was outfitted with everything you could need and bathroom was nice too. Also one of the cleanest AirBnBs we've stayed at! We really enjoyed our time here and it is nicer than the pictures, which must have been taken on a cloudy day :-)

Thanks for a great stay Ryan! This place if fabulous. I needed to get out of the city and booked the morning of my stay. Ryan was quickly responsive to confirm my reservation. This is such a great place for a quiet get away.
Great quiet little place!
Wonderful clean and peaceful
Great place! I hope it's available if I'm in the area again!
no refrigerator, no wifi. bugs on the bed, floor and wall

Rented this cabin for the weekend as a quiet getaway for New Year’s. It was incredibly quiet and serene and just what I needed to relax and unwind. Even got to visit the adorable church right across from it! The place was also very clean. If there was one thing I’d change, it would be that there needs to be a fridge/freezer. Other than that, it was perfect and very fairly priced! I definitely want to come back again!
Host was absolutely great at communicating and I couldn’t ask for a better place to stay. Everything was super clean and peaceful

Place is a bit back in, but other vehicles in and out on the main drive to the prayer chapel. No one in main house while we were there. Everything was great, and as described, except no fridge. Since we were expecting a fridge, we brought stuff to cook that needed to be cold. Since it was winter, we could keep it in the vehicle. Nice peaceful, fairly private spot. Close to Cranberry and Oil City with nice varied shopping and restaurants.
Peaceful and serene surroundings, and a really cozy place to stay the night!

I can't say enough good things about our stay. It was quiet & peaceful. Wish it hadn't rained so we could've got a walk in. If you're looking to get away & detach from distractions this is the place. Ryan is very responsive & considerate. We would highly recommend Ryan's place & this will be our go to when coming back to visit family.
Great place for a great price with some beautiful scenery!
This spot was a perfect cozy room for a night off the road on a long road trip. it was absolutely perfect for what we wanted in price, size, comfortability, etc!!

The best way I can describe this is that it's like a very pleasant clean, simple, basic, furnished studio apartment, with bed, desk, chairs, and kitchen in one open-plan space, with a separate bath consisting of toilet, sink and shower. Pros: Directions and check-in were a breeze, the bed and pillows were comfortable, the kitchen had everything I needed and more-- including full size refrigerator, stove and sink--and the bath was clean, neat and fully functional. It felt like a stay in a tree house, located above another dwelling on the beautiful grounds of a Catholic retreat center conveniently located very near the Van terminus of the Sandy Creek Trail--one of the premier rails-to-trails in Western Pennsylvania. Cons: water processing system is noisy after flushing, as is the frig. The skylight above the bed leaked a bit of cold air. The thermostat was hard to program. Otherwise, a great stay in a great place at a great price! I'd happily book again.
Great place. As advertised, clean and peaceful. Ryan gave very clear and detailed check-in and location directions. Would definitely stay here again.
It was so great to stay here with Ryan. The room was clean, welcoming, and located in the most relaxing, serene location. I can't wait to stay here again!
Great place
Exactly what we expected. We would stay here again. Thank you

Our check-in was at 3 PM but so was our first event in the area. We requested and were granted an early check-in. Upon arrival, the code hadn’t been changed and it had not been cleaned. Ryan quickly helped us get inside, we changed and went off to our event and everything was fresh and clean when we got back. This place was exactly what we needed for a couple of days and was very relaxing. We would return for another visit anytime!

I stayed here with a friend as a pitstop along the way to my destination. It was really easy to get to, clean, peaceful, and felt safe! The pictures in this listing don’t do the place justice. Definitely worth the stay.
Detailed directions made it easy to find. Got in late and had no problem checking in. Quiet place just as described in the listing.

The area is only 3 miles from the Cranberry area. It’s not far from Franklin, Oil City or Titusville for things to do or see. There is also stores for anything you might need. The place is quiet and enjoyable. Ryan also is quick to answer questions or give advice. I will recommend it to others.
We were very pleased all around with the accomodations
Nice quiet place, we loved walking out to the nearby pigs. Would def stay again.
A very nice, cozy apartment which met all my needs for a quiet place to sleep during my travel nursing assignment! 5 star rating!!! Highly recommend!!!
Really great little spot with privacy and beautiful surroundings. Do know that it is next to a Christian house of prayer in what seemed like a pretty conservative area just so you aren’t surprised!
It was nice to have both coffee and tea available. They even had a small bottle of honey! Thanks, Ryan, for a peaceful retreat!

Overall it was an okay stay, the location is fairly peaceful and the house is nice. However I did not sleep well due to random noises starting and going during the night. I believe it was the air conditioning from downstsairs, but it startled me a couple of times. I wouldn't repeat because of that, but if you are not a light sleeper, then it's recommended.
Quite and quaint! Just what we needed.
Ryan's efficiency apartment was pristine, peaceful, and simple. There are well over 120 miles of rail to trails within a 60-minute drive.
Our stay was private, quiet and cozy. Will book it again on next trip.
Very affordable and convenient spot
Quiet, peaceful, comfortable place to spend the night.

We loved our stay. It felt like home. We were attending a wedding about 12 minutes away. It was nice to have a quite place to stay. It is a very nice place, clean and comfortable. The bed had a comfortable mattress. It is secluded and beautiful. Check in was automatic. He gave us the code and we could come and go as we pleased. The room is at the top of the drive. We saw a man walking down the road who pointed it out to us so we had no trouble finding it. you will recognize it when you get up there.
Great location, beautiful surroundings, and the apartment was very clean. Would stay again!

Great place for the price. Larger than your average hotel with added bonus of kitchen, full fridge and a patio for sipping coffee.
Grocery store is not too far away and tons of paved bike trails and more rugged hiking for lovely views 20-30 minutes away.
If looking for a place to sleep and shower your basic needs are met. The setting is very private and peaceful.

Initially I just needed a place to sleep half way between my road-trip. I was pleasantly surprised to find this hidden gem. It was extremely peaceful and serene. Everything was beyond my expectations. The place was clean, tidy and kept cool during the hot summer day I arrived. Next time I drive back to New York I will definitely book here again.
Fantastic retreat and cabin.
Super Cozy, Quiet and Comfy! loved the Pigs! Will def be back! A+ Host!

We loved our stay at Ryan's place! We only stayed one night but would definitely like to stay again! It was easy to get in and was very private and well-furnished. As an extra surprise there were cute piglets in a pen not too far from where you park.
Thank you!

This studio apartment was a great place to stay while in the area for an archery tournament —spacious and logically laid out. The only thing I would "caution" is that the bed would not be comfortable for someone on the taller side, especially if two people are sleeping side by side. I am 5'5" and was touching the bedframe at the foot of the bed while laying comfortably. But regardless, I would definitely stay again!
Great stay and great communication! Thank you Ryan!
A cute, clean and comfortable place to stay in western Pennsylvania. Beautiful surroundings.
adorable little apartment with everything you need. located in a gorgeous wooded area very peaceful lovely.
I stayed here for work purposes and it was a lovely retreat to come back to after a long work day. I would come back to stay again 100%
Beautiful location and great kitchen set up!

This is definitely the place to go if you’re looking for a peaceful and quiet stay that isn’t too far from town. We enjoyed our stay and were pleasantly surprised when we arrived and saw that there were adorable piglets outside!

The stay here was great. My wife and I were looking for something easy and simple while we visit family. The room was clean and looked exactly like the pictures.
The host (Ryan) was great to communicate with. He was clear with instructions and even made sure I could plug my car into the 120v outlet.
Would stay here again.
Had an excellent stay. Host was friendly and helpful, the setting was peaceful, and the room was comfortable and clean. I highly recommend it!
Thank you Ryan, for your hospitality. The place was cozy, quiet and as advertised. Take care!
Amazing place to stay at!
The value of this AirBnb is great. The location is beautiful, the surrounding towns are pleasant, and the apartment itself has everything you need. I highly recommend staying here!

Heron's Landing is a beautiful little apartment that the owner has decorated to make your stay so very relaxing and was remarkably clean. And if you are an old vinyl fan, she even has a good collection of older albums you can play on the turntable. It's easy walking to downtown and the southside of town. Lots of mom-and-pop restaurants and little shops nearby. This is a 2nd floor walkup one flight of stairs. Not a problem for me, but something to keep in mind is you find it hard to walk up steps. Erin also owns the Woods & River Coffee shop you will be staying above. Being that I don't drink coffee, I've never been in a coffee shop, not even a Starbucks. I did have a Cappaccino and told her it was the best one I've had since living in Italy years ago. Make sure you try the Beartown Breakfast Sandwich and homemade muffins. They are out of this world good. Great place to stay being that I haven't been back to Oil City since 1996 and would stay here again. I love my old hometown.
Wonderful stay. Right in the center of everything. The host was helpful friendly and ready to answer questions. Would highly recommend it everyone

The place met our needs; just the one night for sleeping. It's not plush, but we'd rather have saved the money and stayed cheap. She was helpful with the few questions we had by email back and forth. I'd stay there again.
If you’re seeing this review. Book now. Best place to stay “.” in the entire area.
Such a cute place! Waking up to the birds, sound of the river and smell of fresh coffee is the perfect alarm clock!
Went to the coffee shop and had the pleasure of meeting Erin in person, warm and friendly, great place to stay, host and great coffee!

Erin was a wonderful host, very responsive and helpful. The place smelled delicious as soon as you open the door (if you like coffee). Super comfy couch in the office. The shower head is a force to be reckoned with, water was hot, but we found the tub drained slower than it filled, so it was a quick shower.
There are designated parking spots, a beautiful library across the street, and the coffee shop downstairs has really yummy breakfast. Their bagels and cream cheese were a fav. and the Blackberry Mocha is the best I've ever had.
If we find ourselves back in Oil City, we'll be booking Erin's place again.

Nice cozy place! We were looking for something different than a hotel and somewhere that wasn’t far from where we needed to be, and this was it! We loved the easy check in/out and the fact that we were able to cook our own dinner instead of having to find somewhere to go. We also enjoyed relaxing and watching tv on the loveseat instead of a hotel bed. Having our own beds was also nice because we are both bed hogs. Will highly recommend to everyone that travels this way!
Also, LOVED the tea we got in the morning. We will be stopping there again for our drinks!
This apt was just what my daughter and I needed. A clean and affordable home base from which to visit a few local colleges. The coffee shop below is cute and has yummy breakfast. We had a great stay!

Erin is a super host. She was constantly trying to make guests comfortable and reassured.
It's like a home though you're away from your home.
I'll stay at her place again.
Beautiful apartment with a full kitchen and great views of the river, which was very high and gorgeous in the Spring. Very quiet overnight and we appreciated all the amenities, like the toaster.

This was our second stay in this apartment, and we enjoyed it very much both times. It’s quite large, and the bird-themed decor and nature books are fun and interesting. The space included everything we needed. We definitely plan to return.

This was our second time staying at Erin's place and it was just as great as the first time. The apartment is bigger than it looks & is decorated so cute! The view of the river is beautiful & you absolutely cannot beat the price. Our favorite part is listening to vinyl while we get ready in the morning and then heading downstairs for an amazing breakfast sandwich & delicious coffee to start the day. We'll always see if this spot is available when visiting PA from KY. Thanks for another great stay!
Great place to stay. Cozy

The apartment is cute & quirky. It's in the center of town, and it was less than a 10 minute walk to my family. Fresh ground coffee was provided, and there were some other beverages in the fridge, that was nice! If you are a light sleeper, this might not be the place for you, as I was woken up every morning around 6:30 am by the sounds of the coffeehouse below. We had some of their lattes, and they were definitely delicious! I shopped around for Airbnb's in the area, and this one was the best value. Also, nice to use washer, and dryer if you are staying a while.

Erin is such a kind and considerate host. The instructions were clear, and the amenities were awesome. It’s such a treat to wake-up and smell the cozy scent of coffee. I will definitely book again the next time I visit the area!
Comfy, clean, and cute! We hope to spend more time enjoying this spot and its surroundings next time we are in the area. The coffee shop was a great plus!

I had a wonderful stay and the place was even bigger than the photos which was a nice surprise. The kitchen had everything I needed to cook a nice dinner for my family and honestly the sharpest knives I’ve come across in any Airbnb (thank you!) My favorite part was going downstairs for coffee in the morning. It’s a beautiful coffee shop with really great options for food. I would stay here again in an instant.

Erin’s place was great! Some of my favorite things were the river views from the windows, the coffee bar with fresh ground coffee from Woods & River, record player with a nice selection of vinyl & the mix of modern & vintage furniture & decor. Being able to walk downstairs for AMAZING coffee & bagels in the morning was a huge bonus. The price was extremely reasonable. Would love to stay there again next time I’m in the area!
Second time staying here! We love it!

Huge space with great views of the river on one side and the town on the other. The library is right across the street and the coffee shop in the building was bustling the whole time I was there, the food and drinks were fantastic. The place was great for working with an office in addition to the two bedrooms. All amenities were provided, it was definitely like staying at a friend's house! Would love to come back!

very cute apartment above the Woods and River coffee shop. very nice view of the river, peaceful atmosphere. Nice record player in the main bedroom with a nice selection of records. Overall a very nice experience!

I never thought I'd find such comfortable, well equipped and lovingly curated accomodations in Oil City. The location above the fabulous Woods and River Cafe and on the river was absolutely perfect. I could always count on wonderful barrista beverages and delicious food in a welcoming and attractive environment right downstairs. Erin is a great host. I'll definitely stay there again.

Erin is a great host and very quick to respond to any questions you may have. The space is as pictured, and was well stocked and very clean. Erin's coffee shop below not only has excellent coffee, but the food is very good as well. We had soup upon arrival and breakfast sandwiches on both of the mornings of our stay...all delicious.
Also, there is a dedicated parking space just steps away from the apartment door. Erin's place worked out perfectly for us.
highly recommended! central, big, clean, quaint, reserved parking spot

Huge space, felt like a cozy piece of home rather than a stay away in a new place. Hosts are friendly and responsive and care about your stay. Coffee shop below gives great smells in the morning as well as a welcoming breakfast spot in the morning where you can start your work day or gather with family and enjoy great food and even better atmosphere!
This air bnb is incredible don't delay in booking as it's absolutely wonderful, clean cute, and cozy. It's also above an absolutely phenomenal coffee shop!

Loved it! I was a little worried at first with the train tracks being right next to the building thinking one could go by on the middle of the night, but we never heard one the whole start. Very cute and convenient with a great coffee shop right before!
Great stay! Very comfortable and well maintained! Enjoyed our stay! Definitely recommend!

What can I say. Great location, very roomy, washer,dryer etc. Pretty much a furnished apartment with a great coffee shop/cafe downstairs. The place is big! 5 rooms plus the bathroom! We can’t wait to come back.

I actually booked this for my daughter, as she’d have had a pleasure of staying there before and just LOVED IT!
When I explained to Erin this, she not only remembered her but, she was so responsive and kind!
My daughter and I highly appreciated Erin for her kindness and friendly words. And the apartment is absolutely adorable with all of the necessary amenities! We highly recommend!!
Great place to stay for a reasonable price. Will stay again.

This place was such a nice surprise. The pictures don't do it justice- the space was much bigger and nice than expected! And I was impressed at how well stocked everything was. The location was perfect and the place really met our needs!
Felt like we were part of what's good in oil city, right alongside the host 😀

Erin’s place was perfect for my stay! I loved her decorations and it was a very welcoming clean comfortable space. If I need to come back to Oil City for work, I will absolutely be seeing if her space is available first 🙂

My stay was wonderful. The apartment delivered on what it advertised. I was surprised at how beautiful the view of the river was from the bathroom. It was just as gorgeous as the photo. I had some family over to play Scrabble after our get together & was happy to find a nice little selection of LPs on the shelf to spin on the turntable. The bedroom was clean, quiet, as dark as I wanted it to be, with a space heater in the closet if I needed. There were extra blankets & pillows w/2 options of fill sizes. In the morning I could just barely hear the coffee shop starting to open but I was getting up anyway. I don't think it would have awoken me if I hadn't already set my alarm. Even though there was a bag of ground coffee in the kitchen I went into the shop where I met Erin & rec'd my complimentary latte. I must rave about Woods & River! I had them grind & fill a bag to take home, it is that good. The egg Sammy on buttermilk English muffin was divine. Highly recommend! Thanks Erin!

Excellent location - a hidden gem. Coffee ready every morning just downstairs. Lots of thought went into the decor and comforts of the apartment. I even found books and records I liked on the shelves. View outside the windows was beautiful and there were lots of places in walking distance. I don’t think you could ask for a better place to stay in the area. Met the host outside of the apartment and she was very friendly and helpful. We had a great stay!
This was a perfect place to stay. Very comfortable & I think Erin thought of everything! We were able to go to Applefest & School of Rock in Franklin…but stay away from the business! Perfect!
Great space and great host. Enjoyed the coffee shop below the apartment as well. Perfect for us!

This was my 2nd stay, and will probably book again. My primary interests are visiting family and genealogy sleuthing, but this location would work for outdoor enthusiasts as well. I found delicious coffee at the Woods & River Coffee shop downstairs (they are really quiet in the morning). Th Oil City Library is just across the street. The South Side of Oil City boasts magnificent Oil Boom mansions. I found the confluence of Oil Creek and the Allegheny River to be fascinating. So, yeah, I will return!

This spacious second floor apartment is full of wonderful north light, has peaceful views of the Allegheny River below, and is conveniently located in the same building as Woods & River coffee shop -- it's a gem of a place! Highly recommended if you're visiting Oil City or need a place to stay near the bike trail.

Had aa great time biking well maintained paths and learning the local history. The ABNB was exactly as listed. Perfect essentials not fluff. The coffee shop below offered great coffee, breakfast sandwiches and pastries including GF items.

Very clean and organized. Nicely decorated. Lots of space.
Coffee shop downstairs is a bonus.
I loved my stay. The unit was so bright and cheery. Loved having the windows open at night to get the river air in. Will definitely stay again when I’m in town.

We loved staying here! My best friend and I met at Erin’s place for a thrifting adventure. Little did we know that Erin is an amazing decorator and obviously a great thrifter as well. The apartment is insanely cute, comfortable, well decorated with vintage pieces and it’s above the most amazing coffee shop!! We were so happy with every aspect of this trip! There are so many fun things to do in this area! Highly recommend staying here, we hope to come back!
Erin was a great host. Had a little problem with my lock box, but she quickly had me inside. One of my best stays ever.
Easy check in. Convenient location. Coffee shop located below on first floor was a real treat.
Second saty here for us and we loved it again!

This very much felt like I was in a comfortable and welcoming home. . . a beautiful location with great city and river views, a spectacular coffee shop on the first floor, welcoming hosts and a friendly and very walkable community. Oil City - and specifically Heron's Landing right above Woods and River Coffee, are really spectacular. I'm definitely going to book again every time I'm in Oil City, PA!
Super spacious, clean and nice. The host is very hospitable. Especially great if you are a hiker.

Enjoyed our stay in Oil City. Lodging was not fancy but an eclectic, fun vibe, clean and with needed amenities. I did not note that there is no AC in the listing (may be there) so that was a surprise but not a problem as it was not hot. Nice view looking out at the river. I wanted something different at a price point below most hotels and this fit the bill! Enjoyed coffee and breakfast at the coffee shop underneath the lodging. Nice to wake up to the smell of bacon and coffee making.

Erin’s place had everything we needed, and she was so welcoming and hospitable. Great location. Woods & River Coffee is delicious. We loved being able to walk right down to the street and into the shop. Will be staying again next time we visit!
Erin was very responsive and always very kind. The apartment was very spacious and clean; I would absolutely stay here again!
The apartment is much larger than we expected! We enjoyed the decor and midcentury modern furniture. It’s a comfortable place we would definitely choose again when travelling to Oil City.

We booked this spot to have a home base to work remotely while camping at night nearby and it was exactly what we were hoping for. The wifi was quick and the coffee shop downstairs was a great place to sit in the mornings. The space was clean and had everything we needed, would definitely stay again next time we visit Oil City.

The apartment was very spacious and had every amenity that we needed. There were beautiful views overlooking the Allegheny River and a wonderful coffee shop very close with a variety of baked goods. A specified parking place was also a plus. Erin’s response when communicating was within 15 minutes. This unit is walking distance to most attractions in oil city. It’s a great place to stay and I highly recommend it.
Very cozy, convenient and with a beautiful view.

Erin’s place was perfect. We came to the area to explore kayaking on the Allegheny in Franklin and hiking and birding at Oil Creek State Park and this was a great central location for exploring the area.
The apartment is spacious, comfortable, clean, and nicely decorated. We had everything we needed and the coffee shop, Woods and River, was excellent!
Erin was friendly, helpful, and enthusiastic about the area. Highly recommend.

Even better than I had hoped! Super clean, bright, pretty views, coffee shop is awesome. I was worried about the noise from the street but it didn’t bother me at all. Great hosts as well - I’ll definitely be back!

We enjoyed our stay thoroughly. The place was immaculate and charming. And having a coffee shop right below us was an added bonus. We'll definitely come back and have recommended it already to others who go to Oil City periodically.

I stayed here during one of my travel nursing assignments and it exceeded my expectations! I have one regret. I wish I could’ve been there more in the daylight hours since the view and overall aesthetic of Erin’s place was amazing! I can only hope that it’s available next time I am in town for work. What a gem!
a beautiful place to stay. loved the smell of coffee
This was a great, clean, convenient spot for our stay. Thank you!

Erin was a great host! We felt right at home and loved the coffee from downstairs. 😊
I wasn’t completely sure what the kitchen would be like, but (although not pictured) there is a microwave, fridge and full stove.
Unfortunately, the bed was not the most comfortable, which is the only reason for my less than 5 star review.
Wonderful place. Peaceful setting. Beautifully decorated. Amenities went above and beyond.
Great place! Nice in a small town, if you like the smell of coffee and country, this is your place
Very clean and cozy! The coffee shop downstairs is fantastic!

I chose Erin's listing because I was visiting family, doing genealogy work, and I was familiar with the area. I was very pleased with the overall appearance of the unit. It's on the 2nd floor of what appears to be a 100 year old building. The "front" faces the Oil City Library and an attractive boulevard; the rear of the apartment faces the Allegheny River. The apartment is attractively furnished in a combo of mid-century modern and thrift store treasures. Lots of books! And a big + is the coffee shop on the 1st floor!
I liked it so much that I've booked a return in October!

A very cozy appartment. Interior has lovely accesoires (vintage!). Very calm with a beautiful view at the river. Super friendly and helpful host! Perfect for people who want to enjoy the countryside or simply need a place to sleep during a longer roadtrip/travel.
I will definitely stay again when I’m back in town. Erin is a wonderful host!

Such a cute place above a great coffee shop! I travel for work and felt right at home. If I had any issues, Erin is quick to respond. I will absolutely book this place again for my work home. Just wonderful!

The only word is perfect ! simple as that , the airbnb run by the two most amazing people in the world . You can walk right downstairs to enjoy coffee and bagel for their shop. There plenty of room and even had office for me to work from .

We had a wonderful stay at the apartment. It was very spacious and comfortable. It had beautiful natural lighting and cute views of the river, city, and the library. It had all the amenities and then some that we could have wanted during our stay. We were sad we didn't book it for longer. The location was very convenient and we enjoyed smelling the below coffee shop in the morning and stopping in to grab some coffee and bagels to go. Erin was a great and welcoming host. We will definitely look to stay again the next time we are in the area.
Just a great place to stay. Erin is a great host.

My son and I really liked it. We could cook which saved us a lot of $. The rooms were spotless and very large. There was wifi and a smart TV. Erin and Marcy were the best, very helpful and met all our needs. We definitely would stay there again.
Cute and cozy. This place will be a repeat for sure. So convenient for visiting with family.
Enjoyed my stay. Very clean and when I had questions I got a quick answer!
It was beautiful! Thank you for the lovely stay!
Cozy and fun place!!
Erin is an amazing and responsive host. Great communication. The place was great and really enjoyed the stay!
Great stay! Wonderful host!
Great stay for my cousin and I, friendly and accommodating hosts! The space has everything we needed, even enjoyed fresh coffee from downstairs at Woods and River Coffee!

Stayed at Herron's Landing over the Christimas holiday. The spot had everything we needed for our stay. Erin was very prompt with any request we had. We even enjoyed coffee and breakfast from the shop below. Would definitely recommend and stay again.

I can't say enough about Erin and the team and their offering! First off great communication and incredibly friendly! The accommodations were roomy and cozy! While I didn't spend much time inside, the bed was very comfortable and the amenities were great. The ladies were very nice and the coffee shop was great. ... even had almond milk for my coffee! They shared their location was near a trail and I am looking forward to visiting again in warmer weather and taking advantage of it.
If you need to stay in or around Oil City, you won't go wrong staying here. Tremendous value and experience!
Nicely furnished quiet downtown apartment with thoughtful extras/amenities.
Amazing cabin in a relaxing, private, and beautiful spot. If you are coming to the area or just looking for a retreat to relax, this is the place to stay!
Excellent stay great location
Great place, clean, and easy and smooth check in/check out. Very reasonable price.
We had a wonderful time. The cabin had everything we needed for a home base. The area was fun to explore.

We had a wonderful stay at The Rock cabin over Easter. The cabin is beautifully decorated and feels inviting, warm and cozy. We loved being able to look out the windows and watch for wildlife on the beautiful wooded property. I highly recommend The Rock cabin for a relaxing, peaceful getaway!
Stephanie was helpful and responsive. The cabin location was convenient to Franklin. My children enjoyed the forest and nature. Overall it was a great experience!
We absolutely LOVED our stay and would HIGHLY recommend this place!!

The cabin was a lovely stay. It was above and beyond what we had expected just glancing through the photos listed! It is clean, comfortable, and well maintained. I would recommend it to anyone wanting to get away. It’s easily accessible, but still private. A perfect cabin get away

It has wonderful view especially when the place is start snowing! However I personally don't recommend to drive a sport car or any low car here because the parking lot has a really sharp hump so it might cause a damage of your car. Overall very nice trip!
Amazing host, went out of her way to accommodate us and make the stay special. 10/10
We had a great week at the cabin. Friendly and safe neighborhood.
Our stay was absolutely wonderful. It’s so peaceful and got to enjoy the fire pit during the day on a nice fall weekend. Stephanie was a perfect host!

Will definitely visit again. beautiful location. beautiful cabin. right up our alley. Stephanie was fantastic to deal with. we are even looking for property in the Franklin area. it's wonderful. can't say enough!

Came back for the second time! Great cabin, great host, great location. I plan to come back next year as well. Franklin is only a few miles away for needing anything but the location of the cabin is very relaxed and the neighbors aren't close, very relaxing!

This is a wonderful spot. The cabin is a great getaway but it is still near town with numerous outdoor activities nearby such as hiking, biking and paddling. The hosts are helpful with anything you need.
A small but important note: the kitchen has absolutely everything you could need. Just bring any food ingredients and you can cook it here!
The Rock Cabin was so lovely! The kitchen was well stocked & everything we needed was available. We will definitely be back for our girls trip.

Stephanie's cabin is beautiful. The local is gorgeous and it is beautifully appointed. Please note there is NO bathroom in the basement where the extra bedrooms are. It is a very slim winding staircase to get up to the first floor. This is mentioned in the description, but is worth noting again. We would absolutely stay there again!
The sweetest place to stay. Felt at home!

We absolutely loved our stay at the cabin! It was the perfect place to spend a girls birthday weekend. The birthday girl enjoyed the amazing upstairs suite! The cabin looked just like the pictures and was just as cozy and beautiful as we had hoped. The location felt very safe, and we really enjoyed seeing the wildlife.
Some of our favorite things were drinking coffee and eating meals out on the deck, reading on the swing, relaxing by the fireplace, walking the trails, shopping at the Grove City Outlets, cooking meals together in the well stocked kitchen, doing puzzles, and playing games.
If we ever need a place to stay in the Franklin area, we would definitely stay here again!

Pioneer Rock Cabin was lovely and set in a private, peaceful location. We enjoyed our two night stay. It had all the amenities anyone could want. Especially appreciated was the well stocked kitchen items, spices (fresh), coffee, sugar and many other staple and food items, either provided by owner or left by other guests. Everything was fresh and recent; not always what we've found at other rentals we've stayed at. Well supplied kitchen utensils, cookware, dishes, etc. Everything was spotless. Great instructions everywhere on how to use ac/heat, tv, etc. The many decks and seating areas outside were nice; unfortunately the weather wasn't great but we were able to enjoy one day mostly rain free and sunny outside on the decks. Saw deer and other small wildlife. The business area of Franklin was interesting with some nice businesses, candy store, antique stores, restaurants and more. A great retreat to relax and unwind.
We have stayed here a couple times now and it is a perfect little getaway place. Highly recommend staying here.

We needed a quiet cabin for our family getaway and this place was great. Three bedrooms and two bathrooms (although no bathroom in the lower level) and a full kitchen. We appreciated how beautiful the location was. We saw deer multiple times. Would recommend to travelers.
Stayed here with friends of mine and the scenery is beautiful. The place is remote and quiet. Area was clean and Stephanie replied quickly to any questions I had.

Stephanie's cabin was gorgeous and peaceful. We felt lucky to be able to stay at her home and really enjoyed the beauty of the area and the craftsmanship of the cabin. This is by far the best house I've ever seen and stay at in Franklin, PA!
Charming pristine cabin, tastefully decorated with everything you need. Super private, but close enough to stores and activities. Will definitely be visiting again for a long weekend!
Great place to stay, surrounded by wildlife and super close to a great river to visit.
Second time staying here and it was just as awesome as the year before! Everything you need to cook with. Super clean . Comfy beds. Beautiful peaceful location

The place was great!! Stephanie was a very responsive host. The location was beautiful and the cabin itself was cozy, spacious, and clean! The grill and fire pit were a nice perk as well.
The only negative was the beds. They were extremely firm. One of my friends likes a firm bed and they were even a bit hard for her.
Overall, it was a great place and we had a lovely stay!
Great location! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Franklin is a great little town with some nice restaurants. We were in town for a wedding but might return again for a visit.

Stephanie's cabin was exactly what we needed for a weekend away from the craziness of life. The cabin was beautiful inside, tastefully decorated and very clean. It was a nice cozy place to unwind. The cabin is also surrounded by a wooded area and very private, with a nice big fire pit outback. We took advantage of some of her recommendations of places to eat and trails to hike and we were not disappointed.
Stephanie was very prompt with her communication. We would highly recommend this cabin to anyone looking for a place to visit.
Gorgeous deck in beautiful part of country. Great home base for climbing and paddling the area.
Very clean and it had all the amenities we needed.
Great host and beautiful place to stay. Surrounded by peaceful nature, nicely designed interior, comfortable and fun. My kids loved the ping pong table!
Stephanie’s place was beautifully decorated, immaculate and cozy. We felt so at home. Location was good also.
Great place. Comfortable and clean.

Absolutely incredible and a hidden treasure in the Franklin area. It was like something out of a magazine, both the cabin and its surroundings! The light snowfall was an added bonus! Great value! There was absolutely everything you could need or want, especially in the kitchen! This was the perfect place for us to just get away and have some peace and quiet, but also to host two family dinners while in town. Stephanie was ultra responsive and friendly when contacted! If you want to quiet clean place next to a beautiful river this would be it the host John and his wife were the nicest people I’ve met in a long time you can’t go wrong I would recommend this to anybody it’s just absolutely beautiful You definitely will not be disappointed

10 Star vacation! Lovely location and super host. Certainly did not want to leave. Coffee on the deck with a good book in the morning was the best. GREAT kayaking. Quiet and peaceful.

Beautiful and secluded location. We wanted a peaceful place to celebrate our 10th wedding anniversary and we found exactly that. John and Darlene provide a clean and beautiful place with everything you could possibly need for cooking.

John and Darlene were exceptional hosts. Their place was lovely, clean, bright, and welcoming. We had everything we needed - all the comforts of home, everything we needed to cook and serve a meal. There was a nice array of spices as well, and everything we needed to make a pot of drip brew coffee (we did bring our own coffee abs filters just in case though). The only thing we found missing in the kitchen was a wine bottle (corkscrew) opener. However there is a liquor store right in town in Oil City, so we picked one up there. The location right on the river was wonderful and mostly private. You can’t see any other homes except for John and Darlene who live about 50 or so yards away next door. Because they’re so close they checked on us once we got settled in to make sure we had everything we needed. They also left a little note with tips on the kitchen counter as well. Don’t forget to sign their guest book!
They also offer daily kayak rentals including life jackets and firewood can be purchased on site (at a premium for the convenience, compared to purchasing a cord yourself). The fire pit is quite large and there are Adirondack chairs for 5 or 6. The only downside about the fire pit is that it’s hard to get quite close enough to make mountain pies and s’mores because of the large rocks that make up the outer “ring”. We managed though and it worked out just fine. Small children will need a little extra help.
The beds and couch were comfy, and there were enough linens and blankets for everyone. Internet was decent but you’re in the woods so shut it off anyhow!
We were able to swim from the shore and play in the water with the little one. We also tied a few floaties off the dock and spent some time floating and relaxing in place. Lots of eagle sightings and an owl, too.
The only other thing I would like to mention, and it’s at no fault of the hosts, is the water has a slight odor. I believe it may be because this is well water? I’m not certain, but there was a definite odor to the water. We ended up going into town and buying several large 3 gallon jugs of water for drinking, cooking, and brushing our teeth. I’m sure it’s safe to drink, it was just unpleasant. Again, no fault of John - you’ll have that in the country sometimes. No big deal.
All in all it was a wonderful stay and we definitely plan to return. I’ve already told a few friends about the place because we enjoyed it so much!

We had a great stay ! The hospitality was excellent and absolutely everything was considered , truly felt like home away from home. If we are ever planning a trip out that way in the future we would love to book a stay here again.
Thank you again !
